tha-ap546:16.3: Vissāmabhūmi santānaṃ → vissāsaṃ bhūmisantānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vissānabhūmi santānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:25.3: Paccājāto → pacchā jāto (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); sampatto ca (mr)
tha-ap546:28.4: sāriputtamahaddasaṃ → … mathaddasaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sāriputtañca addasaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap546:30.4: yugamattaṃ nidakkhitaṃ → yugamattanirikkhataṃ (bj); udikkhataṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); yugamattaṃ nirikkhitaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:31.2: avocaṃ mamanucchavaṃ → avocaṃ mananucchavaṃ (bj); avocamananucchavaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); avocaṃ mananucchaviṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap546:35.4: kacci vaṅgīsa jānāsi → saccaṃ vaṅgīsa kacci te (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
